text: {| class="infobox" style="font-size: 88%; width: 22em; text-align: center" ! colspan="3" style="font-size:125%; background:red; color:white; text- align:center;"| Active sport clubs of SD Lovćen |- ! style="width:33%; text-align:center;"|30px ! style="width:33%; text-align:center;"|30px ! style="width:33%; text-align:center;"|30px |- ! style="text-align:center;" |Football ! style="text-align:center;" |Football Women ! style="text-align:center;" |Handball |- ! style="text-align:center;" |30px ! style="text-align:center;" |30px ! style="text-align:center;" |30px |- ! style="text-align:center;" |Basketball ! style="text-align:center;" |Basketball Women ! style="text-align:center;" |Athletics |- ! style="text- align:center;" |30px ! style="text-align:center;" |30px ! style="text- align:center;" |30px |- ! style="text-align:center;" |Volleyball Women ! style="text-align:center;" |Volleyball ! style="text-align:center;" |Rugby |- ! style="text-align:center;" |30px ! style="text-align:center;" |30px ! style="text-align:center;" |30px |- ! style="text-align:center;" |Table tennis ! style="text-align:center;" |Car racing ! style="text-align:center;" |Kickboxing |- ! style="text-align:center;" |30px |- ! style="text- align:center;" |Powerlifting |} ŽOK Lovćen (Ženski odbojkaški klub Lovćen) is a Montenergin women's volleyball club founded in 1980. Based in Cetinje, ŽOK Lovćen often participate in Montenegrin women's volley league and Second League. ==History== Volleyball club Lovćen is founded at 1980, but women section played only friendlies during the 80's. At the period from 1990 to 2010, volleyball clubs on Cetinje doesn't existed. Club was reactivated at 2011, and played their first official season in Montenegrin Second League at 2012-13. Biggest success of ŽOK Lovćen was participation in Montenegrin women's volley league 2014-15. ===Record by seasons=== Below is a list of ŽOK Lovćen seasons in Montenegrin women's volleyball competitions. {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" |- !Season !Competition !Pos !G !W !L !SD !Pts |- |2012-13||Montenegrin Second League||4||24||2||22||8:65||6 |- |2013-14||Montenegrin Second League||2||26||18||8||51:29||50 |- |2014-15||Montenegrin First League||10||18||2||16||13:50||6 |} Sources: ==See also== * Montenegrin women's volley league * Montenegrin women's volleyball Cup * Volleyball Federation of Montenegro (OSCG) * SD Lovćen Cetinje * Cetinje ==References== ==External links== * Volleyball Federation of Montenegro Category:Lovćen Cetinje Category:Montenegrin volleyball clubs
title: ŽOK Lovćen Cetinje
